text: Nechanice (; ) is a town in the Hradec Králové Region of the Czech Republic. It has about 2,300 inhabitants. ==Notable people== *Ignác Raab (1715–1787), painter *Johann Baptist Wanhal (1739–1813), composer *Jan Nowopacký (1821–1908), painter *Alois Rašín (1867–1923), politician and economist ==Twin towns – sister cities== Nechanice is twinned with: * Czarny Bór, Poland ==See also== *Nechanitz, USA, unincorporated community in Texas named after Nechanice ==References== ==External links== *Official website Category:Cities and towns in the Czech Republic Category:Populated places in Hradec Králové District
title: Nechanice
